content: repeat 6 times 6 fasten_off leave a long tail for closing hole and shaping booty close hole by sewing into front loops only with tail pull tight making the booty using the same tail insert needle through center hole at rnd15 and bring out center back at rnd9 make line with the yarn insert needle back in center hole at rnd15 bring needle through rnd9 pull yarn tail tightly repeat for more definition knot and fasten_off weave tail in insert needle through bring needle out center hole at rnd15 through the center back at rnd9 make line with the yarn bring needle through insert needle back in rnd9 pull yarn tail center hole at rnd15 tightly 2023 ©crochetbysarahlouise by sarah townsend page 2 of 3 www crochetbysarahlouise com antenna make 2 body color chain 6 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook 1 slp in the next 4 chain spaces 1sc 4 slp fasten_off and leave tail for sewing sew to the top of love bug s head final touches for love bug use pink embroidery thread to add cheeks next to the eyes don t forget to credit crochet by sarah louise as the pattern designer please don t copy or post this pattern or photos as your own i would love to see your beautiful work please share a photo don t forget to tag @crochetbysarahlouise and use hashtags #crochetbysarahlouise #cbslpatterns #crochetwithsarah all of the booty crew patterns can be found here 2023 ©crochetbysarahlouise by sarah townsend page 3 of 3 www crochetbysarahlouise com
